section.p: Create a filter to select Pralines with chocolate type Milk or Dark whose price is at most $0.30.
section.note:
With numeric fields you have several options for number ranges:
Number filter

section.title: Solution
section.p: Open the table Pralines. Create a filter in column ChocolateType and select only the values Milk and Dark. Click then in column PralineCosts in a field with value 0.30. Choose tab Home Selection (group Sort & Filter) Less Than or Equal To $ 0.30 .
